ygData.subject: Re: Specialization ?
ygData.msgSnippet: dungin it all depends on what you wanna do...do you wanna have better attack spells or what? if you just wanna heal, then i d go for alteration....if you wanna
ygData.messageBody:
dungin it all depends on what you wanna do...do you wanna have better attack
spells or what? if you just wanna heal, then i'd go for alteration....if you
wanna do both, i'd say go for evoc beacause then you don't burn all your mana
blasting and can still heal

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 37 <didn't get my goal of 38 ): > cleric also of The Rathe
